question: T sign is seen in -
exp: Ans. is 'b' i. e., Membrane in twin pregnancyo 'T sign' refers to appearance of the inter-twin membrane in a monochorionic twin pregnancy.
topic_name: Obstetrical Ultrasonography in the First Trimester

question: Spalding sign is seen in -
exp: Ans. is 'c' i. e., IUD o One important radiological sign suggestive of maceration in intrauterine death is Spaulding sign, i. e. skull bones over ride each other.
topic_name: Obstetrical Ultrasonography in the First Trimester
